OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: IP to trigger Async Engine Job for Bulk Deleting OLIs. Expected parameters: 1) Order Id: String 2) Root Ids of OLIs selected for deletion: List of Object with attribute "Id"(example: [{Id:"rootId1"},{Id:"rootId2"},{Id:"rootId3"}])
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ESM_BulkDeleteOrderLineItems

omniProcessElements.name: SendNotificationFailedToStart
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "%setValues:asyncProcessName% has failed to start.", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%orderId%", "title" : "Bulk Delete Order Line Items", "userID" : "%setValues:userID%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%startAsyncJob:code% <> 202", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction2", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: SendNotificationStarted
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "%setValues:asyncProcessName% has started. We'll notify you when it is completed.", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%orderId%", "title" : "Bulk Delete Order Line Items is in progress", "userID" : "%setValues:userID%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%startAsyncJob:code% = 202", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction1", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: SetValuesBulkDeleteOrderLineItems
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "asyncProcessName" : "Bulk Delete for %orderId%", "userID" : "=$Vlocity.UserId" }, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "label" : "SetValues1", "responseJSONNode" : "setValues", "responseJSONPath" : "", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.name: startAsyncJob
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "additionalData" : { "SalesOrderId" : "%orderId%", "userId" : "%setValues:userID%" }, "asyncProcessName" : "%setValues:asyncProcessName%", "asyncProcessSteps" : [ { "asyncJobDetails" : { "executeProcess" : { "asyncJobNumberOfRetriesOnFail" : 0, "executeAsyncJobsInSequence" : true, "itemsToProcessPerAsyncJob" : 10, "name" : "ESM_BulkDeleteOrderLineItemsExecuteProcess", "type" : "Integration Procedure" }, "finishProcess" : { "name" : "ESM_BulkDeleteOrderLineItemsFinishProcess", "type" : "Integration Procedure" } }, "stepName" : "Bulk delete Order line items" } ], "itemsToProcessList" : "%RootItemIds%", "referenceId" : "%orderId%_bulk_delete_QLIs" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "VOIAsyncProcess", "remoteMethod" : "startAsyncJob", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }
